data.lyric:
[ti:Salt (Syn Cole Remix)]

[00:00.37]Salt (Syn Cole Remix) - Ava Max
[00:01.65]Lyrics by：Amanda Ava Koci/Henry Walter/Autumn Rowe/Madison Love/Nicole Morier
[00:04.42]
[00:07.98]Oh-oh I got breaking news
[00:10.85]And it's not about you oh-oh
[00:13.50]
[00:15.44]Oh-oh I've been breaking hearts too
[00:18.30]And I learned it all from you oh-oh
[00:21.06]
[00:21.74]I got my thigh-highs on feel like Wonder Woman
[00:25.80]That's when you want all in but I'm not your woman
[00:29.61]When my lipstick pops and I feel like Monroe
[00:33.31]That's when you want me most oh-oh
[00:36.56]I'm all out of salt I'm not gonna cry
[00:40.10]Won't give you what you want
[00:41.47]'Cause I look way too good tonight
[00:44.05]I'm all out of salt tears are running dry
